Name: Shelter
Description: Take shelter in place or per instruction

Name: Evacuate
Description: Relocate as instructed in the instruction

Name: Execute
Description: Execute a pre-planned activity identified in instruction

Name: Avoid
Description: Avoid the subject event as per the instruction

Name: Monitor
Description: Attend to information sources as described in instruction

Name: Assess
Description: Evaluate the information in this message.

Name: AllClear
Description: The subject event no longer poses a threat or concern and any follow on action is described in instruction
